title: Dirty Little Secrets
description: Born in poverty, Charlotte Gillespie was not afraid of hard work or fighting for what she believed in. Now she had a fabulous husband and a life most women would envy.And yet, something was missing…In a desperate attempt to spice up her sex life, Charlotte joins a woman only networking group, Dirty Little Secrets, run by the mysteriously exotic Eleanor Pattullo and discovers a world of deep, dark, delights…Clever, compelling and unconventional – Corporate lawyer James Gillespie was no one’s idea of a big bad Vampyre.Life was good.He had a woman he adored. A stellar career that fed his ferocious ambition.But James had a problem.He couldn’t find it within himself to take his wife’s vein and bring her fully into his world…When he discovers Charlotte’s secret life James unleashes the beast within. But can Charlotte ever forgive him?When the master of magic, the Vampyre Ezekiel arrives badly wounded and begging for help, James must battle not only to save his marriage, but their souls…
author: C.C. MacKenzie
